title: Colugo Camp
blurb: Immerse yourself in the wild with our all-inclusive experience.
description: Stay at Colugo Camp, where your journey comes with everything — accommodation, dining, guided tours and unforgettable wildlife encounters. This all-inclusive Roar & Rest experience at the Mandai Wildlife Reserve offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature and wildlife. Enjoy comfortable accommodations, delicious meals, and exclusive guided tours that bring you up close to amazing animals. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts seeking an immersive and memorable adventure.
Keyword_tag: Wildlife, Accommodation, Dining, Guided Tours, Wildlife Encounters, Nature, Adventure

title: Colugo Camp: A Night in the Wild Adventure
blurb: Enjoy an exclusive promo code in your inbox today!
description: Embark on a unique overnight adventure at Colugo Camp, nestled within Mandai Wildlife Reserve. This immersive experience includes a 2-day, 1-night stay with park admission to Singapore Zoo, River Wonders, and Night Safari. Enjoy guided tours and savor two delicious meals, including dinner and breakfast. Perfect for families and wildlife enthusiasts, the camp offers a blend of education and excitement. Discover the wonders of nocturnal animals and create unforgettable memories in the heart of nature. Free parking is available for in-house guests at Mandai Wildlife EAST carpark. Minimum age of participation is 3 years old and above. This family-friendly program promises an engaging and educational experience for all ages.
Keyword_tag: overnight stay, wildlife, guided tours, family, education

title: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife Reserve
blurb: Experience a unique overnight adventure in nature.
description: Embark on an unforgettable overnight adventure at Colugo Camp, nestled within the heart of Mandai Wildlife Reserve. This immersive experience offers families and nature enthusiasts the chance to connect with wildlife in a unique and engaging way. Enjoy guided tours, interactive activities, and comfortable camping accommodations, creating lasting memories for all ages. Perfect for families seeking an educational and adventurous getaway, Colugo Camp provides a blend of learning and fun amidst the beauty of Singapore's natural landscape. Discover the wonders of nocturnal wildlife and create unforgettable moments under the stars.
Keyword_tag: overnight camp, wildlife, nature, family, adventure

title: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife Reserve Staycation
blurb: Enjoy a unique staycation experience at Mandai!
description: Experience a unique staycation at Colugo Camp, nestled within the Mandai Wildlife Reserve. Enjoy communal amenities such as bathrooms and a dining hall. Complimentary parking is available for in-house guests. This family-friendly experience offers a chance to connect with nature and enjoy the tranquility of the surroundings. Perfect for families looking for a unique and memorable getaway. The camp provides a comfortable and convenient base for exploring the wildlife reserve and its attractions. Enjoy the convenience of on-site amenities and the opportunity to immerse yourselves in the natural beauty of the area.

title: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife EAST Experience
blurb: All-inclusive camping experience at Mandai Wildlife.
description: Colugo Camp offers a 2-day, 1-night camping experience at Mandai Wildlife EAST. The package includes accommodation, two meals (dinner and breakfast), park admission to three parks, guided tours, and wildlife encounters. Activities include a welcome drink, free time in Singapore Zoo, dinner, Night Safari with reserved seating, a light supper, early entry to River Wonders, and a guided tour. The minimum age to participate is three years old. Adults must supervise minors at all times. The rates include admissions to the relevant park(s), guided tours, and meals. Optional tours and additional nights are available upon request, subject to availability.
venue_name: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife EAST
Keyword_tag: camping, wildlife, Mandai, zoo, night safari, river wonders, guided tour, family, kids

title: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife EAST
blurb: All-inclusive camping experience at Mandai Wildlife EAST.
description: Colugo Camp offers a 2-day, 1-night camping experience including accommodation, two meals (dinner and breakfast), park admission to three parks, guided tours and wildlife encounters. The program includes check-in, welcome drinks, free time in Singapore Zoo, dinner, Night Safari with reserved seatings and tram, light supper, early entry to River Wonders with guided tour, and check-out. Optional tours and additional nights are available upon request. The minimum age to participate is three years old. Adults must supervise minors at all times. Some programs are subject to weather conditions.
Keyword_tag: camping, wildlife, zoo, night safari, river wonders, guided tours, family, kids

title: Colugo Camp at Singapore Zoo and Night Safari
blurb: Enjoy a unique overnight glamping adventure.
description: Experience an unforgettable overnight stay at Colugo Camp, nestled within the heart of the Singapore Zoo and Night Safari. This immersive glamping adventure offers a unique opportunity to connect with nature and wildlife. Enjoy exclusive access to the parks, participate in guided tours, and indulge in delicious meals. Perfect for families seeking a memorable and educational experience, Colugo Camp provides a comfortable and engaging way to discover the wonders of the animal kingdom. Activities include animal encounters, night walks, and campfire stories, creating lasting memories for all ages. The camp features luxurious tents, ensuring a comfortable and relaxing stay amidst the natural surroundings. This family-friendly experience combines adventure, education, and relaxation, making it an ideal getaway for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts.
Keyword_tag: glamping, Singapore Zoo, Night Safari, wildlife, family adventure

title: Colugo Camp at Mandai Wildlife Reserve EAST
blurb: All-inclusive camping experience at Mandai Wildlife EAST.
description: Colugo Camp offers a 2-day, 1-night camping experience at Mandai Wildlife EAST. The package includes accommodation, two meals (dinner and breakfast), park admission to Singapore Zoo, River Wonders and Night Safari, guided tours, and up-close wildlife encounters. Rates start from S$550 per tent per night for two campers, including both adults and children. Prices may vary based on season and availability. The minimum age to participate in Roar & Rest is three (3) years old. Reservations must be made at least three (3) calendar days before the intended date of the stay.
price_display: From S$550 per tent per night
Keyword_tag: Camping, Wildlife, Mandai, Singapore Zoo, River Wonders, Night Safari, Guided Tours, Wildlife Encounters, Accommodation, Family

title: Colugo Camp Visitor Information and Navigation
blurb: Explore the campsite with ease using the Colugo Camp map.
description: Plan your visit to Colugo Camp using the Mandai App. Use the transport feature and wayfinding map to explore Rainforest Wild ASIA. Don’t miss out on the ranger talks and animal sightings. Choose from several easy ways to get here, including the Mandai Khatib Bus and public transport options. Navigate with ease using our directions.
